scripts.deploy: npm version patch && npm run deploy:all
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:common && parallelshell "npm run deploy:lcu-sln-reporting" "npm run deploy:lcu-el-reporting-view" "npm run deploy:lcu-el-reporting-edit"
scripts.deploy:common: npm version patch --prefix projects/common && ng build common && npm publish ./dist/common --access public
scripts.deploy:lcu-el-reporting-edit: npm version patch --prefix projects/lcu-el-reporting-edit && ng build lcu-el-reporting-edit && npm publish ./dist/lcu-el-reporting-edit --access public
scripts.deploy:lcu-el-reporting-view: npm version patch --prefix projects/lcu-el-reporting-view && ng build lcu-el-reporting-view && npm publish ./dist/lcu-el-reporting-view --access public
scripts.deploy:lcu-sln-reporting: npm version patch --prefix projects/lcu-sln-reporting && ng build lcu-sln-reporting && npm publish ./dist/lcu-sln-reporting --access public
scripts.deploy:reporting-demo-forge: ng build reporting-demo-forge --prod && npm publish ./dist/reporting-demo-forge --access public
